Name: Silent Seven
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
History: A riff on the classic 'Silent Third' cocktail first published in the 1937 Cafe Royal Cocktail Book . Originally made with Scotch whisky but perhaps not so silent with rock 'n' roll Tennessee whiskey.
Nutrition: One serving of Silent Seven contains 205 calories
